# wu-divider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                        | Description                                           |
| --------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| `--wu-divider-line-color`   | Color of divider line                                 |
| `--wu-divider-spacing`      | Spacing on top and bottom side of divider             |
| `--wu-divider-text-bg`      | Background of text that sits on the divider line      |
| `--wu-divider-text-color`   | Color of divider text                                 |
| `--wu-divider-text-spacing` | Left/right side spacing between text and divider line |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
